elements.label: Minutes Ticking
elements.description:

The clock is beginning to tick.

elements.label: Hours Wasting
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

Weather and ware may have taken their toll.

elements.label: Days Withering

few could survive so long.

elements.label: Too Long

The Last destination of many a sailor are the shores of No Hope.
